branchCategory.name: VQC4000 Manifold/Valve Assembly with Flat Ribbon Cable
branchCategory.description: <p>The VQC with flat ribbon connector for ease of wiring and maintenance work. The use of multi-pin connectors to replace wiring inside manifold blocks provides flexibility when adding stations or changing manifold configuration.</p>
